00417 #define EXP_OP_STATIC   0x0     
00418 #define EXP_OP_SIG      0x1

00453 #define EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL 0x24

00456 #define EXP_OP_PEDGE    0x27

00459 #define EXP_OP_LAST     0x2a    
00460 #define EXP_OP_EOR      0x2b    
00461 #define EXP_OP_DELAY    0x2c    
00462 #define EXP_OP_CASE     0x2d    
00463 #define EXP_OP_CASEX    0x2e    
00464 #define EXP_OP_CASEZ    0x2f    
00465 #define EXP_OP_DEFAULT  0x30    
00466 #define EXP_OP_LIST     0x31    
00467 #define EXP_OP_PARAM    0x32    
00474 #define EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x)      (((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_STATIC) && \
00475                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LAST) && \
00476                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_LIST) && \
00477                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND_SEL) && \
00478                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASE) && \
00479                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEX) && \
00480                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_CASEZ) && \
00481                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DEFAULT) && \
00482                                      !((SUPPL_IS_ROOT( x->suppl ) == 0) && \
00483                                        ((SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SIG) || \
00484                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_SBIT_SEL) || \
00485                                         (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) == EXP_OP_MBIT_SEL)) && \
00486                                        (SUPPL_OP( x->parent->expr->suppl ) != EXP_OP_COND)) && \
00487                                      (SUPPL_OP( x->suppl ) != EXP_OP_DELAY)) ? 1 : 0)
00488 
00493 #define EXPR_COMB_MISSED(x)        (EXPR_IS_MEASURABLE(x) & (~SUPPL_WAS_TRUE(x->suppl) | ~SUPPL_WAS_FALSE(x->suppl)))
